alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:30AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade County through 715 AM EDT... At 630 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coral Gables, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Coral Gables, South Miami, Virginia Key, Kendall, North Miami, Doral, Miami Lakes, Hialeah Gardens, Pinecrest, Opa-Locka, Miami Springs, Sweetwater, West Miami, El Portal, Medley, Westchester, Gladeview and Glenvar Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
